description: Unshovelled location: Sidewalk | City Owned: No | Details: This gas station is a constant offender. Most crosswalks on top of the Broadway T stop on the Redline get overlooked when it snows.  This is a major car, bus and pedestrian area.  In its current condition (please see attached picture) this is especially dangerous for parents with strollers and handicapped folks.  If these side walks and crosswalks aren't cleared properly potentially someone will get struck by oncoming traffic.

Note: this is to correct Ticket #101002038397
